Budenofalk<tm tmtype="reg"/> capsules Indications and dose

Mild to moderate Crohn's disease affecting the ileum or ascending colon

Chronic diarrhoea due to collagenous colitis

By mouth

  • Adult

    3 mg 3 times a day for up to 8 weeks, reduce dose for the last 2 weeks of treatment.

Autoimmune hepatitis, induction of remission

By mouth

  • Adult

    3 mg 3 times a day.

Autoimmune hepatitis, maintenance

By mouth

  • Adult

    3 mg twice daily.

 National funding/access decisions

Scottish Medicines Consortium (SMC) Decisions

The Scottish Medicines Consortium has advised (April 2015) that Budenofalk gastro-resistant capsules are accepted for restricted use within NHS Scotland for the treatment of autoimmune hepatitis in non-cirrhotic patients who are intolerant of conventional oral corticosteroids (prednisolone) with severe corticosteroid-related side effects (actual or anticipated) such as psychosis, poorly controlled diabetes or osteoporosis.
